snippet: Shares in Suntory Beverage and Food gained modestly in their debut in Tokyo on Wednesday despite the recent shaky response to new offerings in markets around the world.
abstract: Shares in Suntory Beverage and Food gained modestly in their debut in Tokyo on Wednesday despite the recent shaky response to new offerings in markets around the world.

headline.main: Suntory Unit's $4 Billion I.P.O. Rises in Tokyo Trading Debut
